PWS_EDUCATION.TITLE: Prader-Willi Syndrome Education
PWS_EDUCATION.INTRO_DESC_1: Prader-Willi Syndrome (PWS) is a complex genetic condition that affects many parts of the body...
PWS_EDUCATION.INTRO_DESC_2: As children with PWS get older, they typically experience insatiable appetite...
PWS_EDUCATION.MANAGEMENT_DESC: Management of Prader-Willi Syndrome often includes:
PWS_EDUCATION.MANAGEMENT_1: Calorie-controlled diets and food security measures
PWS_EDUCATION.MANAGEMENT_3: Physical therapy to improve muscle tone
PWS_EDUCATION.MANAGEMENT_EXTRA: Collaboration with a multidisciplinary team is crucial...
PWS_EDUCATION.DISCLAIMER: This information is for educational purposes only...
